trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data received and operated on by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定由這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" /> 接收和作業的資料型別。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of data output by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" /> 產生的資料輸出類型。

trans-unit.source: Provides a dataflow block that invokes a provided <see cref="T:System.Func`2" /> delegate for every data element received.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料流程區塊，為每個收到的資料項目叫用提供的 <see cref="T:System.Func`2" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: The function to invoke with each data element received.
trans-unit.target: 要以各個接收的資料項目叫用的函式。

trans-unit.source: All of the data from the returned <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> will be made available as output from this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" />.
trans-unit.target: 所有從 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 中傳回的資料都可以當做這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" /> 中的輸出來使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" /> with the specified function.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的函式，初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="transform" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="transform" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The function to invoke with each data element received.
trans-unit.target: 要以各個接收的資料項目叫用的函式。

trans-unit.source: All of the data asynchronously returned in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> will be made available as output from this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" />.
trans-unit.target: 所有在 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 中以非同步方式傳回的資料都可以作為這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" /> 中的輸出使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" /> with the specified function.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的函式，初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="transform" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="transform" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The function to invoke with each data element received.
trans-unit.target: 要以各個接收的資料項目叫用的函式。

trans-unit.source: All of the data from the returned in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> will be made available as output from this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" />.
trans-unit.target: 所有從 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 中傳回的資料都可以作為這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" /> 中的輸出使用。

trans-unit.source: The options with which to configure this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來設定這個<see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" /> 的選項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" /> with the specified function and <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ExecutionDataflowBlockOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的函式和 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" />，初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ExecutionDataflowBlockOptions" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="transform" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="transform" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="dataflowBlockOptions" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataflowBlockOptions" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The function to invoke with each data element received.
trans-unit.target: 要以各個接收的資料項目叫用的函式。

trans-unit.source: All of the data asynchronously returned in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> will be made available as output from this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" />.
trans-unit.target: 所有在 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 中以非同步方式傳回的資料都可以作為這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" /> 中的輸出使用。

trans-unit.source: The options with which to configure this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來設定這個<see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" /> 的選項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" /> with the specified function and <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ExecutionDataflowBlockOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的函式和 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2" />，初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ExecutionDataflowBlockOptions" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="transform" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="transform" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="dataflowBlockOptions" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataflowBlockOptions" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Signals to the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> that it should not accept nor produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> 發出訊號，表示不應接受也不應產生任何其他訊息，也不應使用任何其他延後的訊息。

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.Complete%2A> has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.Completion%2A> task will enter a final state after it has processed all previously available data.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.Complete%2A>已經在資料流程區塊上呼叫，該區塊將會完成，且其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.Completion%2A>工作會進入最終狀態它已經處理所有先前可用的資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.Complete%2A> will not block waiting for completion to occur, but rather will initiate the request; to wait for completion to occur, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.Completion%2A> task may be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.Complete%2A> 將區塊等待完成發生，而是會起始要求但要等待完成發生，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.Completion%2A>可能使用的工作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />，其表示非同步作業和資料流程區塊的完成。

trans-unit.source: The task.
trans-unit.target: 工作。

trans-unit.source: A dataflow block is considered completed when it is not currently processing a message and when it has guaranteed that it will not process any more messages.
trans-unit.target: 資料流程區塊會時視為完成它目前未處理的訊息，以及當它有保證，不會處理任何其他訊息。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> will transition to a completed state when the associated block has completed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>完成相關聯的區塊時，會轉換為已完成狀態。

trans-unit.source: It will transition to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion> state when the block completes its processing successfully according to the dataflow block’s defined semantics.
trans-unit.target: 會轉換到<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>區塊完成其處理成功根據資料流程區塊時的狀態定義語意。

trans-unit.source: It will transition to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted> state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to an unhandled exception, and it will transition to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to receiving a cancellation request.
trans-unit.target: 會轉換到<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>狀態時即為資料流程區塊已完成處理提前因未處理的例外狀況，且會轉換到<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>資料流程區塊完成狀態過早處理，因為收到取消要求。

trans-unit.source: If the task completes in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted> state, its `Exception` property will return an <xref:System.AggregateException> containing the one or more exceptions that caused the block to fail.
trans-unit.target: 當工作在<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>狀態，其`Exception`屬性會傳回<xref:System.AggregateException>包含造成失敗之區塊的一或多個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of input items waiting to be processed by this block.
trans-unit.target: 取得等候由這個區塊處理的輸入項目的數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of input items.
trans-unit.target: 輸入項目的數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.InputCount%2A> does not include any items currently being processed by the block or any items that have already been processed by the block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.InputCount%2A>不包含任何項目目前正在處理的區塊或區塊已處理的任何項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to which to connect this source.
trans-unit.target: 要連線到此資源的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowLinkOptions" /> instance that configures the link.
trans-unit.target: 設定連結的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowLinkOptions" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Links the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> .
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> 連結至指定的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />。

trans-unit.source: An IDisposable that, upon calling Dispose, will unlink the source from the target.
trans-unit.target: IDisposable，在呼叫 Dispose 時，將會取消來源和目標間的連結。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is null (Nothing in Visual Basic) or <paramref name="linkOptions" /> is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 為 null (在 Visual Basic 中為 Nothing) 或 <paramref name="linkOptions" /> 為 null (在 Visual Basic 中為 Nothing)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of output items available to be received from this block.
trans-unit.target: 取得可從此區塊接收的輸出項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of output items.
trans-unit.target: 輸出項目的數目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that caused the faulting.
trans-unit.target: 導致錯誤的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: Causes the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> to complete in a <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: 造成 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> 在 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> 的狀態中完成。

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.System%23Threading%23Tasks%23Dataflow%23IDataflowBlock%23Fault%2A> has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.Completion%2A> task will enter a final state.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.System%23Threading%23Tasks%23Dataflow%23IDataflowBlock%23Fault%2A>已經在資料流程區塊上呼叫，該區塊將會完成，且其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.Completion%2A>工作將會進入最終狀態。

trans-unit.source: Faulting a block, as with canceling a block, causes buffered messages (unprocessed input messages as well as unoffered output messages) to be lost.
trans-unit.target: 判定為失敗的區塊，做為與取消區塊，會造成遺失緩衝的訊息 （未處理的輸入的訊息，以及 unoffered 的輸出訊息）。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="exception" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="exception" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> of the message being consumed.
trans-unit.target: 使用的訊息的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> consuming the message.
trans-unit.target: 使用訊息的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was successfully consumed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功使用訊息，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Called by a linked <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to accept and consume a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> previously offered by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 由連結的<see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />呼叫以接受及使用先前由此 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> 提供的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the consumed message.
trans-unit.target: 使用的訊息的值。

trans-unit.source: This may correspond to a different <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> instance than was previously reserved and passed as the <paramref name="messageHeader" /> to <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1.ConsumeMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock{`0},System.Boolean@)" />.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會對應到不同的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> 執行個體，這個執行個體先前已保留並做為 <paramref name="messageHeader" /> 傳遞到<see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1.ConsumeMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock{`0},System.Boolean@)" />。

trans-unit.source: The consuming <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> must use the returned value instead of the value passed as <paramref name="messageValue" /> through OfferMessage <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2.System#Threading#Tasks#Dataflow#ITargetBlock{TInput}#OfferMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,`0,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock{`0},System.Boolean)" />
trans-unit.target: 使用的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />必須使用傳回的值，而不是使用做為 <paramref name="messageValue" /> 經 OfferMessage <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock`2.System#Threading#Tasks#Dataflow#ITargetBlock{TInput}#OfferMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,`0,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock{`0},System.Boolean)" /> 傳送的值。

trans-unit.source: If the message requested is not available, the return value will be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法使用要求的訊息，則傳回的值就是<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> instances linked to this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instance may use <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A>, and it must only be used to consume <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instances previously offered by this source to the target.
trans-unit.target: 只有<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601>執行個體連結到這<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601>執行個體使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A>，並且它必須只能取用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader>先前提供此來源到目標執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="messageHeader" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="messageHeader" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> of the reserved message being released.
trans-unit.target: 釋放的保留訊息的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> releasing the message it previously reserved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />，會釋放它先前保留的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Called by a linked <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to release a previously reserved <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 由連結的<see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />呼叫以釋出先前由此 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> 保留的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> instances linked to this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instance may use <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReleaseReservation%2A>, and it must only be used to release <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instances previously and successfully reserved by the target.
trans-unit.target: 只<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601>執行個體連結到這<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601>執行個體使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReleaseReservation%2A>，並且它必須只能釋放<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader>目標所保留的先前且已順利執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="messageHeader" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="messageHeader" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> did not have the message reserved.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 沒有保留訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> of the message being reserved.
trans-unit.target: 保留的訊息的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> reserving the message.
trans-unit.target: 保留訊息的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Called by a linked <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> to reserve a previously offered <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> by this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 由連結的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> 呼叫以保留先前由此 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> 提供的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message was successfully reserved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功保留訊息，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> instances linked to this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601> instance may use <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A>, and it must only be used to reserve <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader> instances previously offered by this source to the target.
trans-unit.target: 只有<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601>執行個體連結到這<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601>執行個體使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A>，並且它必須只能保留<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader>先前提供此來源到目標執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If `true` is returned, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601> must subsequently call either <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReleaseReservation%2A> for this message.
trans-unit.target: 如果`true`傳回，則<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601>必須接著呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReleaseReservation%2A>這個訊息。

trans-unit.source: Failure to do so may result in the source being unable to propagate any further messages to this or other targets.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做可能會導致無法傳播到這個或其他目標的任何其他訊息的來源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A> must not be called while the target is holding any internal locks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A> 必須不會呼叫目標所保留的任何內部鎖定時。

trans-unit.source: Doing so will violate the lock hierarchy necessary to avoid deadlocks in a dataflow network.
trans-unit.target: 這樣會違反鎖定階層以避免資料流程網路中的死結。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="messageHeader" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="messageHeader" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" /> instance that represents the header of the message being offered.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader" />執行個體，表示所提供的訊息的標頭。

trans-unit.source: The value of the message being offered.
trans-unit.target: 正在提供的訊息的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" /> offering the message.
trans-unit.target: 提供訊息的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1" />。

trans-unit.source: This may be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the target must call <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1.ConsumeMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock{`0},System.Boolean@)" /> synchronously during the call to <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />, prior to returning <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus.Accepted" />, in order to consume the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標必須在傳回 <see cref="M:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1.ConsumeMessage(System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader,System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock{`0},System.Boolean@)" /> 之前，在呼叫 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" /> 期間，以同步方式呼叫 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus.Accepted" /> 以使用訊息，則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Offers a message to the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />, giving the target the opportunity to consume or postpone the message.
trans-unit.target: 提供了訊息給<see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1" />，讓目標有機會使用或延後訊息。

trans-unit.source: The status of the offered message.
trans-unit.target: 提供之訊息的狀態。

trans-unit.source: If the message was accepted by the target, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus.Accepted" /> is returned, and the source should no longer use the offered message, as it is now owned by the target.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標已接受訊息，則會傳回 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus.Accepted" />，而且來源不應該再使用所提供的訊息，因為現在它是目標所擁有。

trans-unit.source: If the message was postponed by the target, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus.Postponed" /> is returned as a notification that the target may later attempt to consume or reserve the message; in the meantime, the source still owns the message and may offer it to other blocks.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息已由目標延後，會以通知形式傳回 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus.Postponed" />，目標稍後可能會嘗試使用或保留訊息，同時來源仍擁有訊息，而且可能會將訊息提供給其他區塊。

trans-unit.source: If the target would have otherwise postponed but source was <see langword="null" />, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus.Declined" /> is instead returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標會延後，但來源是 <see langword="null" />，則改為傳回 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus.Declined" />。

trans-unit.source: If the target tried to accept the message but missed it due to the source delivering the message to another target or simply discarding it, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus.NotAvailable" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標嘗試接受訊息，但因為來源將訊息傳遞給另一個目標或直接捨棄訊息，使得目標遺漏訊息，則會傳回 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus.NotAvailable" />。

trans-unit.source: If the target chose not to accept the message, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus.Declined" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標選擇不接受訊息，則會傳回 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus.Declined" />。

trans-unit.source: If the target chose not to accept the message and will never accept another message from this source, <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus.DecliningPermanently" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標選擇不接受此訊息，且將不會接受來自此來源的其他訊息，則會傳回 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus.DecliningPermanently" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="messageHeader" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="messageHeader" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="consumeToAccept" /> may only be true if provided with a non-null <paramref name="source" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供非 null <paramref name="consumeToAccept" />，則<paramref name="source" /> 只可以是 true。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the formatted name of this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> 執行個體之格式化名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the formatted name of this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> 執行個體之格式化名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: Inherited from <xref:System.Object> .
trans-unit.target: 繼承自<xref:System.Object>。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlockOptions.NameFormat%2A> option.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowBlockOptions.NameFormat%2A>選項。

trans-unit.source: The predicate value must successfully pass in order for it to be received.
trans-unit.target: 述詞的值必須成功傳遞才能讓它接收。

trans-unit.source: <c>filter</c> may be <see langword="null" />, in which case all items will pass.
trans-unit.target: <c>filter</c> 可能是 <see langword="null" />，這種情況下將傳遞所有項目。

trans-unit.source: The item received from the source.
trans-unit.target: 從來源接收的項目。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to synchronously receive an available output item from the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IReceivableSourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試以同步方式從 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IReceivableSourceBlock`1" /> 接收可用的輸出項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an item could be received; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以接收項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block waiting for the source to provide an item.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖等候提供項目來源。

trans-unit.source: It will return after checking for an element, whether or not an element was available.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回之後檢查的項目，或有可用的項目。

trans-unit.source: The items received from the source.
trans-unit.target: 從來源接收的項目。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to synchronously receive all available items from the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IReceivableSourceBlock`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試以同步方式從 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IReceivableSourceBlock`1" /> 接收所有可用項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if one or more items could be received; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法收到一或多個項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block waiting for the source to provide an item.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖等候提供項目來源。

trans-unit.source: It will return after checking for elements, whether or not an element was available.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回之後檢查項目，或有可用的項目。
